content: ककुभ् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} A direction, quarter of the compass; वियुक्ताः कांतेन स्त्रिय इव न राजंति ककुभः <ls>Mk. 5. 26</ls>; <ls>Śi. 9. 25</ls>, <ls n="Śi.">3. 33.</ls> {@--2@} Splendour, beauty. {@--3@} A wreath of Campaka flowers. {@--4@} A sacred treatise or Śāstra. {@--5@} A peak, summit. {@--6@} A Rāgiṇī or personified mode of music. {@--7@} The personified quarter of the sky. {@--8@} Breath, animation. {@--9@} Unornamented hair; or hair hanging down as a tail.
